actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to remove civil liability barriers surrounding donating fire equipment to volunteer fire companies.
short_title: Good Samaritan Volunteer Firefighter Assistance Act of 2000

summary.text: Good Samaritan Volunteer Firefighter Assistance Act of 2000 - Provides that neither a person (including any corporation, company, association, firm, partnership, society, joint stock company, or any other entity) who donates re-certified fire control or fire rescue equipment nor a State or local agency that administers the distribution of such equipment shall be liable for personal injuries, property damage, or death proximately caused by a defect in such equipment. Excepts such a person or agency from such liability protection if: (1) the person's act or omission causing the injury, damage, or loss constitutes malice, gross negligence, recklessness, or intentional misconduct; or (2) the person is the manufacturer of such equipment.
